channel.title: [508] Client won't connect to server [508]
channel.description:
Hey, I'm stuck right now and hopefully someone here can help me. I have portforwarded, changed to my IP in the client.java. And I am running the server first. No errors are coming up, and my run window is saying Connection received from: 192.168.1.1. Yet it stalls when I click login and ends saying Error connecting to server. Yet no errors are coming up.
Please and thanks,
OMG its Nick[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 18, 2009, 08:03:49 pm[/size][hr]Please close. Problem fixed.
